name: 100 RUB: Operation Global Denomination
description:
After another wave of financial crisis, the people’s purses became empty. All cash is gone and money on banks accounts are under the threat. The government decided to make currency denomination and take away all that's left. Go to the government’s bank repository and take your money back! Collect coins, bills and keys to open the door for another level.
Don't allow them to rob you! Fill your purse with money!
Another crisis and inflation. But now, the money denomination is come!

Features:
Oldschool platformer.
Unique main hero - The Purse.
Piles of money.
Many dangerous saw and spike traps.
Simple and intuitive control.
